title: Husband of BBC presenter killed by the Covid vaccine is suing Astrazeneca , page 7
cleaned_text:
originally posted by: Oldcarpy2 

 a reply to: NoCorruptionAllowed 

 

 

 "So you are boasting here that you have helped people because of your great empathy for things they have suffered from, but I can't ever recall seeing you show anyone any empathy for anything EVER here. 

 

 So you lead a double life then?" 

 

 Boasting? 

 

 I was actually pointing out to a poster who constantly accuses me of "defending the pharmaceuticals " that in my real life I have spent some 30 odd years doing the precise opposite. 

 

 Doing stuff in real life is rather more important than posting stuff on an anonymous internet forum. 

 

 "EVER"?!!! 

 

 Please..... 

 

 Quite the echo chamber on here. 

 

 Indeed! Nobody can verify what you are saying. But it can comment on your posts that are full of vaccine apologetics, denialism of reality and defending of the pharmaceuticals. 

 

 Look at the thread. Legal action against Astrazeneca for a 75 deaths and serious adverse reactions from the jab. On the top of this the vaccine has been withdrawn from the UK, the country they has produced it. 

 

 The facts speak for themselves. The AZ vaccine has been CANCELLED!!! Indeed! Nobody can verify what you are saying. But it can comment on your posts that are full of vaccine apologetics, denialism of reality and defending of the pharmaceuticals.Look at the thread. Legal action against Astrazeneca for a 75 deaths and serious adverse reactions from the jab. On the top of this the vaccine has been withdrawn from the UK, the country they has produced it.The facts speak for themselves. The AZ vaccine has been CANCELLED!!! 







 

 Yeah only 40,000 care workers lost their jobs ......it's a big nothing burger. 

 

 And there were many other people as well that had to take it or lose their job. 

 

 

 edit on 12-4-2023 by Itisnowagain because: (no reason given)

 a reply to: ScepticScot Yeah only 40,000 care workers lost their jobs ......it's a big nothing burger.And there were many other people as well that had to take it or lose their job. 







originally posted by: ScepticScot 

 

originally posted by: Itisnowagain 

 a reply to: ScepticScot 

 

 Will I be coersed and be threatened with losing my job if I don't buy one? 

 

 

 

 Who is threatening your job? 

 

 Wasn't a requirement for the vast majority of jobs in the UK. Social care, people working with the most vulnerable, was the only major exception where it was applied. 

 

 We pretend we don't know? 

 

 Let's see the facts again 

 

 Legal action against Astrazeneca for 75 deaths and serious adverse reactions from the jab. On the top of this the vaccine has been withdrawn from the UK, the country they has produced it. 

 

 The facts speak for themselves. The AZ vaccine has been CANCELLED!!! We pretend we don't know?Let's see the facts againLegal action against Astrazeneca for 75 deaths and serious adverse reactions from the jab. On the top of this the vaccine has been withdrawn from the UK, the country they has produced it.The facts speak for themselves. The AZ vaccine has been CANCELLED!!! 







 

 Well, at least I am open about my qualifications and experience. 

 

 You? 

 

 I think I have had quite enough of being accused of "defending the pharmaceuticals" when in real life I have done the precise opposite. 

 

 As for "denialism of reality", look in a mirror, you are denying mine. 

 

 I don't much care whether you believe me or not, but please don't accuse me of lying. 

 

 Real life is reality. a reply to: Asmodeus3 Well, at least I am open about my qualifications and experience.You?I think I have had quite enough of being accused of "defending the pharmaceuticals" when in real life I have done the precise opposite.As for "denialism of reality", look in a mirror, you are denying mine.I don't much care whether you believe me or not, but please don't accuse me of lying.Real life is reality. 







 

 You seem to be engaging in plenty of vaccine apologetics and denying the reality of vaccine damages and deaths. You are also denying that the AZ vaccine has been cancelled. It's really amazing. 

 

 Let's see the facts again as the facts speak for themselves: 

 

 Deaths due to the vaccine 

 Debilitating conditions due to the vaccine 

 Severe adverse reactions due to the vaccine 

 Withdrawal of the vaccine from most countries 

 

 

 Hardly a success story and hardly the miracle of science as it has been described by the press and the journalists who themselves played a crucial role in propagating misinformation and disinformation all along. 

 

 edit on 12-4-2023 by Asmodeus3 because: (no reason given)

 a reply to: alldaylong You seem to be engaging in plenty of vaccine apologetics and denying the reality of vaccine damages and deaths. You are also denying that the AZ vaccine has been cancelled. It's really amazing.Let's see the facts again as the facts speak for themselves:Deaths due to the vaccineDebilitating conditions due to the vaccineSevere adverse reactions due to the vaccineWithdrawal of the vaccine from most countriesHardly a success story and hardly the miracle of science as it has been described by the press and the journalists who themselves played a crucial role in propagating misinformation and disinformation all along. 







originally posted by: Oldcarpy2 

 a reply to: Asmodeus3 

 

 Well, at least I am open about my qualifications and experience. 

 

 You? 

 

 I think I have had quite enough of being accused of "defending the pharmaceuticals" when in real life I have done the precise opposite. 

 

 As for "denialism of reality", look in a mirror, you are denying mine. 

 

 I don't much care whether you believe me or not, but please don't accuse me of lying. 

 

 Real life is reality. 

 

 Still what you are saying is irrelevant to these threads. Nobody can verify anything here. The topic of the conversation is very different. Not personal qualifications. 

 

 The AZ vaccine has been cancelled and a group of people from your country are taking Astrazeneca to the courts. Still what you are saying is irrelevant to these threads. Nobody can verify anything here. The topic of the conversation is very different. Not personal qualifications.The AZ vaccine has been cancelled and a group of people from your country are taking Astrazeneca to the courts.
